verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's 2 o'clock, your eyes are shut,
your phone alarm is going off
The sun is up, you're still in bed,
another day gone again

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This isn't what you wanted was it
I know you've got
a pulse let's get it started

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You've got one shot,
all you got take it now
You gotta get up, get up,
get up oh-wo-oh-wo-oh
One life, live it right,
keep on moving forward
You've got one shot
everybody it's your time
I wanna see you on the other side
You've got one shot,
all you got, live out loud
Come on wake up, wake up,
wake up before it's over

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You got a truck, take a drive
go somewhere to feel alive
You got a dream, say a prayer,
a little faith will get ya there

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
This is what
you wanted promise
Never go back to
the way you started

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
